definitions.explanation: use to classify objects or other traits

description of 'units' (expressed with 'symbol') used to measure some quantity along a 'dimension'

hasParameters.name: symbol
hasParameters.explanation: the common symbolic representation of the unit

definitions.explanation: a type indicator for kinds of a measurement units, AKA grams, seconds, dollars.
description of one fundamental component of a derived unit

hasParameters.name: fundamentalExponent
hasParameters.explanation: the exponent, positive, negative, fractional (for inverse) that the component contributes to the base derived unit.

hasParameters.name: fundamentalScale
hasParameters.explanation: the constant scale factor applied to the fundamental unit (prior to application of exponent) by the derived unit

hasParameters.name: fundamentalOffset
hasParameters.explanation: the constant offset applied to the scaled fundamental unit (prior to application of exponent) by the derived unit
